1@148.body:
Ok, here's my problem, I have two test sites I created

~removed~
http://127.0.0.1:43110/test.theblocklist.bit

I have them both signed and Zeronet says "Full connection on port 15441" and both sites state "Seeding - no peers"
which is expected because no one knows of my sites.

But to test to see if they worked, I took my secondary laptop, put it on my phones hotspot to grab a diffrent network address from the host machine and made attempts to connect to the site.

On the laptop it stated No-peers found even though my host machine is seeding and eventually it said 1 peer found but it still errored out on pulling the content.json on my laptop while I had my host machine seeding the content the whole time.

Any suggestions?

> [nofish](#comment_105_2): Both working for me!

Guess it takes time for population, woke up this morning and I have peers now, thanks.
Time to focus more time into this. =)

'python.exe zeronet.py siteSign MYSITE MYKEY'  only errors out.
